root.name: Video Recorder
root.description: Record what you are doing on a sequence as a .avi file, fully compatible with Icy.
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2017-05-22 16:09:09
Fixed for last kernel.
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2015-10-22 17:28:43
- updated for last kernel. - fixed minor issues.
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-04-05 17:00:16
* Added Record Screen feature. * Supports multiple screen, but not at the same time.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-03-16 17:33:39
First Version.
Should allow to record everything you are doing on the sequence.
Not working: switching from 2D to 3D.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-03-16 17:32:05
